Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Kho koo akorerwe olwa abali mubilindwa balilamusibwa mubafuu
Toto Nyasaye wabu Omulesi inyanga eyo aliba nende amakhuwa kabu boosi
Ne nishiina shilakhumanyia mbu nishina shikhong’ondanga
Inyanga	yabandu	baliba	shinga tsimburukuru tsisaalanibwe
Ne tsinguli tsiliba shinga ipamba isakhululwe
Kho ulia weshichelo shishie shiliba eshisiro
Ne ulia weshichelo shishie shiliba eshiangu
Oyo eshimenyo shishie shiliba mumulilo kwa Hawiya
Ne nishina shikhumanyisia mbu nishina esho
Mana khandi shikali kario tawe! Mulitsa okhumanya
Shikali kario tawe! Mumanyangakhwo amachesi katoto
Mana khandi toto bwene muliyilola nende imoni yatoto
Mana khandi toto mulirebwa inyanga eyo okhulondokhana nende obwokholo
Toto bwene omundu ali mu khusikha, (abula inganga)
Halali balia basuubila, mana nibakhola amalayi , nenibaboolanila okhwema khubwatoto, nende okhwifwiila
Eshinyasio eshikhongo shilinyoola buli ulia wokhutiabukha omumoonyi
Aparanga	mbu	omwandu	kukwe kulimutonyia tsinyanga tsiosi
Shikali kario tawe! Ali khwesululwa niyenjisibwa mu Hutwama
Ne nishina shilakhwechesia mbu Hutwama nishina
Koo shiwalolakhwo shinga Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi yakholaAbandu beyinzofu balia
Okhunala khwabu tsinjendo tsieyirotso nende tseshirumbi
Khomana balaame Nyasaye wabu Omulesi owe Inzu ino
Ulia Ubaliisinjia balanyoola inzala tawe, mana nabaliinda okhurulana nende oburi
Koo! olutsikhwo ulia ukananga umurungo kwe inyanga ye indukho
Nohomba shakholangakhwo eshinani shokhulisia umutakha tawe
kho laama ne osinze khulwa Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi
Enywe muli nende idini yenyu, nasi endi nende idini yanje.”
Olwa obuhabini bwa Nyasaye nende obwikuli buliitsa
Ne nolola Abandu nibenjila mudini ya Nyasaye mumikanda
Awo ofumie oluyali lwa Nyasaye wuwo, ne omusabe eshileshelo, toto bwene niye Omulesheli muno
Chiasikha emikhono chibili chiaa Abu Lahab, mana nasikha
Omwandu kukwe shikulimukhoonya tawe nohomba ebiayakhalabanila
Boola mbu: “ye ni Nyasaye mulala yenyene.”
Ne abulaho ufwanana ninaye kata mulala
Boola : “ndilinda khu Nyasaye Omulesi owa mabwibwi,”
Okhurulana nende obusuku obwa bilia ebiayaloonga
Nende okhurulana khu obusuku bwabalia bafuririranga amafundikho
Nende khu obusuku	bwa weyishinda olwaba nakhola eshikhalikhali
Bola: “ndiliinda khu Nyasaye Omuliindi wa Abandu”
Okhurulana nende obusuku bwo buyendi bwashetani..khefisanga
